event.title: Live with Kelly & Ryan
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 33
event.description: Today's guests are Taylor Schilling, Sabrina Carpenter.

event.title: Steve Harvey
event.subtitle: Season 6 Episode 102
event.description: Steve Harvey hosts a brand new syndicated American talk show. Co-produced by Harvey, Endemol, and NBCUniversal, the show debuted on Sept. 4th, 2012. Topics covered will include real life issues men and women face as well as ways to better themselves. Steve will also occasionally interview big name celebrities.

event.title: Jeopardy!
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 118
event.description: Returning Champion; Becca Arm / Herndon, Virginia, Library Worker; Phil Ricciardi / North Wales, Pennsylvania, Management Consultant.

event.title: Entertainment Tonight
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 129
event.description: Each episode of Entertainment Tonight gives viewers an inside look at television, film and music, including interviews with each industry's biggest stars.

event.title: The Insider
event.subtitle: Season 14 Episode 129
event.description: The Insider is an American entertainment news program covering events and celebrities. It debuted on September 13, 2004 as a spinoff of Entertainment Tonight and started as a popular segment that took viewers "behind closed doors" and gave them "inside" information.

event.title: Extra
event.subtitle: Season 24 Episode 149
event.description: Extra serves as a straight rundown of news headlines and gossip throughout the entertainment industry, providing coverage of events and celebrities; however, since 2013, it has also placed an even greater emphasis on interviews and insider previews of upcoming film and television projects.

event.title: TMZ
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 129
event.description: TMZ is an American syndicated entertainment and gossip news television show. It is essentially a television version of its sister operation, TMZ.com, a news website with a heavy emphasis on gossip of celebrities' personal lives.

event.title: MSNBC Live
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 357
event.description: Current events and up to the minute political coverage.

event.title: MSNBC Live
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 358
event.description: Current events and up to the minute political coverage.

event.title: MTP Daily
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 117
event.description: Chuck Todd breaks down the top issues of the day.

event.title: For the Record with Greta
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 113
event.description: Greta provides news coverage and analysis of the day's top headlines, spanning politics and beyond.

event.title: Hardball with Chris Matthews
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 117
event.description: Leaders and newsmakers debate political issues.

event.title: All In with Chris Hayes
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 117
event.description: Chris Hayes drives the conversation about the news of the day and more topics.

event.title: The Rachel Maddow Show
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 117
event.description: With honesty and rigor, Rachel Maddow uniquely connects dots to advance stories on her show The Rachel Maddow Show. By exposing the layers of complex issues, she reveals their significance to viewers. In her irreverent style, Maddow transcends the narrative and provides unique perspective.

event.title: The Last Word with Lawrence O'Donnell
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 113
event.description: Current issues and news stories.

event.title: The 11th Hour with Brian Williams
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 101
event.description: Looking at the major political stories of the day and breaking campaign news.

event.title: Kenneth Copeland
event.subtitle: Season 19 Episode 119
event.description: Kenneth Copeland is one of the leaders of the Charismatic Movement and is an American author, musician, public speaker, and televangelist. Copeland has been strongly identified with preaching a prosperity and abundance message, commonly referred to as the prosperity gospel over the last 45 years. His Tarrant County, Texas-based Kenneth Copeland Ministries (KCM) advocates daily application of the "Word of God", meaning the Bible. KCM is a teaching ministry that specializes in biblical teaching that focuses on faith, love, healing, prosperity and restoration through diverse media, such as television, books, CD and DVD. KCM's motto is Jesus is Lord based upon Romans 10:9.

event.title: The Price is Right
event.subtitle: Season 45 Episode 185
event.description: The Price is Right, originally hosted by Bob Barker until 2007 and Drew Carey thereafter -- features a wide variety of games and contests with the same basic challenge: Guess the prices of everyday (or not-quite-everyday) retail items. Four contestants, all of whom are seated in one of the wildest audiences in daytime game-show history, are called to the stage to play a preliminary pricing round. That winner joins the host on stage for one of more than 70 different pricing games. After three such games, the contestants spin a big wheel -- hoping to get as close to $1 as possible -- in the "Showcase Showdown". The two highest winners of that round advance to the final, where prizes could be cars or roomsful of furniture. A trio of models presents the prizes.

event.title: The Young and the Restless
event.subtitle: Season 45 Episode 58
event.description: The Young and the Restless revolves around the rivalries, romances, hopes and fears of the residents of the fictional Midwestern metropolis, Genoa City. The lives and loves of a wide variety of characters mingle through the generations, dominated by the Newman, Abbott, Chancellor, Baldwin and Winters families. ­ When The Young and the Restless premiered in 1973, it revolutionized the daytime drama. It continues to set the standard with strong characters, socially conscious storylines, romance and sensuality.

event.title: The Bold and the Beautiful
event.subtitle: Season 30 Episode 371
event.description: They created a dynasty where passion rules, they are the Forresters, the first name in Fashion. The Bold and the Beautiful, a world of fashion, glamor and romance. A place where power, money and success are there for the taking in a city where dreams really do come true. Follow the lives and loves of the Forresters on The Bold and the Beautiful...

event.title: The Talk
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 114
event.description: Today's guests are Natasha Lyonne, Big Boy, guest co-host Vanessa Williams.

event.title: CBS Evening News with Scott Pelley
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 157
event.description: Scott Pelley brings more than 21 years of experience with CBS News to the anchor chair most recently held by Katie Couric, offering a survey of major news stories. Additionally, each broadcast offers human-interest segments as well as interviews with newsmakers.

event.title: The Late Show with Stephen Colbert
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 98
event.description: Tonight's guests are Trevor Noah, Ilana Glazer, Sam Richardson.

event.title: The Late Late Show with James Corden
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 75
event.description: Tonight's guests are Fred Armisen, Tituss Burgess, Edgar Wright, Gavin DeGraw.

event.title: The View
event.subtitle: Season 20 Episode 187
event.description: Today's guest is Kim Kardashian West.

event.title: General Hospital
event.subtitle: Season 55 Episode 52
event.description: General Hospital, which celebrated its golden anniversary on April 1, 2013, continues its tradition of passion, intrigue and adventure that takes place in the fictional town of Port Charles in upstate New York. The glamour and excitement of those who have come to find their destinies in this familiar seaport town intertwine with the lives, loves and fortunes of beloved, well-known faces. As always, love, danger and mind blowing plot twists continue to abound on General Hospital with contemporary storylines and unforgettable characters.

event.title: ABC World News Tonight with David Muir
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 165
event.description: ABC World News Tonight empowers viewers each day by providing the latest information and analysis of major news events from around the country and the world.

event.title: Jimmy Kimmel Live
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 81
event.description: Tonight's guests are Jamie Foxx, Trace Adkins.

event.title: Nightline
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 118
event.description: This half-hour program provides viewers with in-depth reporting on one or more of the major stories in the news, with occasional segments on pop culture. Journalists Dan Harris, Juju Chang and Byron Pitts share hosting duties for this late-night program.

event.title: Days of Our Lives
event.subtitle: Season 52 Episode 186
event.description: Days of our Lives is set in the fictitious Midwestern town of Salem. The core families are the Bradys, the Hortons and the DiMeras, and the multi-layered storylines involve elements of romance, adventure, mystery, comedy and drama.

event.title: NBC Nightly News
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 159
event.description: Lester Holt reports the day's major international and domestic news stories each weeknight. The broadcasts also feature human-interest segments called Making a Difference, which spotlight ordinary Americans who positively affect the lives of those around them.

event.title: Little Big Shots
event.subtitle: Season 2 Episode 13
event.description: Season two comes to a close with special return performances from season-two fan favorites Caleb, a 4-year-old worship leader, and Reuben, an incredible singer from Wales, along with Brandon, an amazing 10-year-old piano player from season one. Host Steve Harvey also visits with a 5-year-old who became an Internet sensation, two dancers, a magician and a brick-breaking karate kid. He also visits with the show's impressive team of kid translators who have helped him communicate with all the international Little Big Shots this season.

event.title: The Carmichael Show
event.subtitle: Season 3 Episode 4
event.description: When Jerrod survives a tragedy, he fights against being coddled by his family and being labeled a victim, but things are made harder when he's forced to tell a police officer exactly what he saw.

event.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 95
event.description: Tonight's guest is Miley Cyrus.

event.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 75
event.description: Tonight's guest are Taylor Schilling, Jim O'Heir, Lizzy Goodman, Eric Moore.

event.title: America's News Headquarters
event.subtitle: Season 10 Episode 240
event.description: Analysis of the day's news.

event.title: The Fox News Specialists
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 33
event.description: After their original evening panel show The Five moved to primetime, Fox News is bringing back the roundtable discussion with a new group of hosts. The Fox News Specialists will feature Eric Bolling, Kat Timpf and Eboni Williams along with two guests every weekday to discuss the latest stories

event.title: Special Report with Bret Baier
event.subtitle: Season 20 Episode 124
event.description: Former Fox News chief White House correspondent Bret Baier hosts this live weeknight newscast that places an emphasis on political stories from Washington, D.C.

event.title: The Story
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 108
event.description: This show previously known as "The First 100 Days" because during presidential campaigns, the candidates often talk about some of the things they promise to get done in their first 100 days in office if elected. That is the time frame that this series previously focused on hosted by Martha MacCallum. Now Martha will focus on everything the President says and does since his first 100 days in office and the significance of all his moves.

event.title: Tucker Carlson Tonight
event.subtitle: Season 2 Episode 121
event.description: Veteran political journalist Tucker Carlson hosts this nightly series that bears his name. Fox News describes the show as an "hour of spirited debate and powerful reporting,'' with Carlson taking on issues that viewers care about.

event.title: The Five
event.subtitle: Season 7 Episode 119
event.description: This weekday opinion show is a round-table ensemble of five rotating Fox News personalities who discuss and debate the top news stories, controversies and issues of the day.

event.title: Hannity
event.subtitle: Season 22 Episode 115
event.description: Host Sean Hannity interviews political figures and newsmakers and offers his own conservative perspective on current events.

event.title: Tiki and Tierney
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 43
event.description: Tiki Barber and Brandon Tierney tackle the top stories in sports.

event.title: Time to Schein
event.subtitle: Season 3 Episode 97
event.description: Adam Schein tackles the sports world with a unique perspective on the latest news and trends.

event.title: Red Bull Global RallyCross
event.subtitle: Season 4 Episode 5
event.description: World RX of Norway is airing from Hell, Norway.

event.title: NFL Live
event.subtitle: Season 19 Episode 124
event.description: Analysts break down the latest news in the NFL, offering views on players, coaches and management.

event.title: Jalen & Jacoby
event.subtitle: Season 2 Episode 97
event.description: Jalen Rose and David Jacoby break down the latest in sports and pop culture.

event.title: Clarence
event.subtitle: Season 3 Episode 16
event.description: After listening to a public radio broadcast during class, Clarence is inspired to record a radio interview of his own featuring his buddy Sumo. When Ms. Baker hears the charming interview, she calls in a favor and gets Clarence a spot on the actual Aberdale Public Radio with host Debra Copper! The search is on - to find the perfect interview subject for his big day. Episode features Fresh Air's Terry Gross as Debra Copper.

event.title: Uncle Grandpa
event.subtitle: Season 5 Episode 10
event.description: Uncle Grandpa, from Pete Browngardt, is based upon an Emmy-nominated short and follows the exploits of everyone in the world's "magical" uncle and grandpa.

event.title: First Take
event.subtitle: Season 11 Episode 105
event.description: Max Kellerman joins Molly Qerim and Stephen A. Smith as they debate the hottest topics in sports.

event.title: ESPN FC
event.subtitle: Season 5 Episode 127
event.description: Highlights, news, reactions and opinions from the day in soccer.

event.title: SportsNation
event.subtitle: Season 9 Episode 110
event.description: The topics covered in this weekday show are chosen by fans via ESPN.com's SportsNation site.

event.title: Inside Minicamp Live
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 13
event.description: Latest news and updates from around the league as teams report to mandatory minicamps.

event.title: Inside Minicamp Live
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 14

event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 15
event.description: Latest news and updates from around the league as teams report to mandatory minicamps.

event.title: NFL Total Access
event.subtitle: Season 14 Episode 123
event.description: NFL Network's flagship show with the latest news, opinions, highlights and interviews from around the league.

event.title: The Loud House
event.subtitle: Season 2 Episode 28
event.description: The Loud House focuses on Lincoln Loud, an 11-year-old boy, who lives in a house with his ten sisters—eldest sister Lori, unintelligent yet beautiful blonde Leni, aspiring rock star Luna, jokester and comedienne Luan, energetic athlete Lynn, gloomy emo Lucy, personality-opposite twins Lola and Lana, intellectual genius Lisa and baby Lily—and how he tries to survive as the only son in the family by finding creative solutions to the ordinary and chaotic problems in the household.

event.title: Bloomberg Technology
event.subtitle: Season 3 Episode 112
event.description: Emily Chang delivers news on technology, innovation and the future of business.

event.title: Bloomberg Daybreak Asia
event.subtitle: Season 2 Episode 115
event.description: Essential stories from the close of the U.S. markets to the open of trading across Asia.

event.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
event.subtitle: Season 6 Episode 116
event.description: From London, breaking business news stories in the lead-up to the opening of European markets.

event.title: Fast Money
event.subtitle: Season 11 Episode 113
event.description: A lively hour of exchange and debate takes place among four of Wall Street's leading traders.

event.title: Mad Money
event.subtitle: Season 13 Episode 113
event.description: Money manager Jim Cramer helps viewers navigate the treacherous labyrinth of Wall Street trading, helping them to recognize opportunities and avoid pitfalls along the way.

event.title: Primer Impacto
event.subtitle: Season 24 Episode 118
event.description: A magazine covering the breaking news and the most striking. A large team of journalists provides full reports of the country and the world. The program also has two weekly health segments.

event.title: Hotel Todo Incluido
event.subtitle: Season 2 Episode 118
event.description: Comedy program where various celebrities come as special guests.

event.title: La Reina de la Canción
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 22
event.description: Are you the next queen of the song? Queen of Song is a program of singing competition to prove who is the best in the regional Mexican genre.

event.title: La Piloto
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 72
event.description: The story of Yolanda, a girl who dreams of becoming a pilot, who ends up flying planes used to transport drugs in Mexico, Colombia and Central America.John Lucio, her boyfriend and ex instructor flight, betrays her to avoid going to jail.

event.title: Primer Impacto Extra
event.subtitle: Season 11 Episode 118
event.description: This series presents a compilation of the best news stories of Primer Impacto. The stage and its presenters are different from Primer Impacto but the reports are the same. The notes presented in the program cover different areas from politics, health, education, immigration so controversial, unusual, speculative, incredible, paranormal, journalistic program also includes stories of personal achievement and dramas experienced by people issues.

event.subtitle: Season 3 Episode 118
event.description: The highlights of the action, information and analysis of the most important sports issues of the day, around the world.

event.subtitle: Season 13 Episode 118
event.description: Traditional reporting and online resources update international news.

event.subtitle: Season 7 Episode 117
event.description: Erin Burnett only concerns herself with translating world events into relevant information for viewers, paying close attention to such topics as the Middle East and women's issues.

event.title: Anderson Cooper 360°
event.subtitle: Season 15 Episode 117
event.description: Anderson Cooper brings his prickly but often witty perspective to current events and personalities in the news.

event.title: CNN Tonight with Don Lemon
event.subtitle: Season 4 Episode 112
event.description: "CNN Tonight with Don Lemon" is part of the network's prime-time block, an hourlong offering of the day's biggest news stories mixed with features, interviews and commentary.

event.title: Around the Horn
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 109
event.description: Sportswriters around the country discuss sports issues.

event.title: 30 for 30
event.subtitle: Season 3 Episode 23
event.description: When the Celtics and Lakers meet again in the 1985 and 1987 NBA Finals, the teams' disdain and animosity for each other gradually turns to mutual respect -- led by superstars Magic Johnson and Larry Bird.

event.title: Golfing World
event.subtitle: Season 8 Episode 14
event.description: Hosts Anna Whiteley and Tony Wrighton provide latest tourney updates and player interviews.

event.title: NASCAR America
event.subtitle: Season 4 Episode 64
event.description: News, highlights and interviews with the stars of speed and stock car racing.

event.title: NHL Live
event.subtitle: Season 8 Episode 96
event.description: The latest news and analysis from around the NHL.

event.title: NHL Overtime
event.subtitle: Season 8 Episode 124
event.description: The latest news and highlights of the National Hockey League and beyond.

event.title: Weather Underground
event.subtitle: Season 3 Episode 118
event.description: A breakdown of the science behind today's weather, with frequent visits from guest meteorologists.

event.title: Caso Cerrado: Edición Estelar
event.subtitle: Season 4 Episode 116
event.description: The parties and witnesses expose their real legal problems before the lawyer Ana María Polo, in a scenario that makes of court. After listening attentively and asking questions, she presents the final verdict that the parties must abide by.

event.title: La Querida del Centauro
event.subtitle: Season 2 Episode 58
event.description: The story of Yolanda, a beautiful and intelligent recluse, who in prison becomes the mistress of one of the country's most important drug traffickers, Benedictino Garcia, known as "The Centaur". This relationship gives Yolanda a lot of power, but it's also her nightmare when she's released.

event.title: La Querida del Centauro
event.subtitle: Season 2 Episode 59
event.description: The story of Yolanda, a beautiful and intelligent recluse, who in prison becomes the mistress of one of the country's most important drug traffickers, Benedictino Garcia, known as "The Centaur". This relationship gives Yolanda a lot of power, but it's also her nightmare when she's released.

event.title: Alaskan Bush People: Off the Grid
event.subtitle: Season 4 Episode 11
event.description: Alaskan Bush People: Off the Grid is a special series that airs extended episodes with extra information and unseen footage from the show Alaskan Bush People and both shows air on the Discovery Channel.

event.title: Alaskan Bush People
event.subtitle: Season 6 Episode 1
event.description: This spring, Animal Planet takes a journey deep into Alaska's bush, where naturalist and adventurer Billy Brown, along with his wife, Ami, and their seven children, chooses to live life on his own terms, connected to wild nature and bonded to each other. In the new series Alaskan Bush People, the family of nine strives to be self-sufficient against all odds- often shunning modern society to live off the wilderness and to walk where no man has ever walked before. After the tragic death of his parents and sister that left him orphaned at 16, Billy Brown vowed to live life on his own terms and create his own family to reclaim the love that he lost. With Ami by his side, Billy traveled the lower 48 states and eventually found home in the sprawling landscape of the last frontier, where they have spent most of the last 30 years raising their children. "Our family is doing what is natural for human beings to do. We survive on what we hunt, fish, trap and barter for," Brown says. "We explore, we wander, we live. If you think about it, it's the life we were meant to live."

event.title: Homestead Rescue
event.subtitle: Season 2 Episode 1
event.description: The Raneys help the Johnson family who have no drinking water or food sources; their dogs have been killed by a mystery predator and worry they are next.

event.title: E! News
event.subtitle: Season 16 Episode 225
event.description: Maria Menounos and the "E! News'' team create an often irreverent look at Hollywood happenings, along with all the latest celebrity news, trends and gossip. The anchors and reporters cover television, film and music, as well as the celebrity party scene.

event.title: Hollywood Medium
event.subtitle: Season 2 Episode 12
event.description: The Hollywood Medium sees stars he is a medium, clairvoyant, medical intuitive- and an LA newbie- Tyler Henry has an undeniable gift that he's ready to share with the world. E!'s newest series, produced by 44 Blue Productions, explores the life of this clairvoyant medium as he brings messages from the beyond to Hollywood celebrities. In each episode Tyler delivers jaw-dropping readings to celebrities looking for advice, connection and closure with loved ones who have passed on, balancing his unique abilities with trying to be a regular millennial. The combination of Tyler's youthful exuberance and startling revelations has made him the most sought after medium in Hollywood!

event.title: E! News
event.subtitle: Season 16 Episode 226
event.description: Maria Menounos and the "E! News'' team create an often irreverent look at Hollywood happenings, along with all the latest celebrity news, trends and gossip. The anchors and reporters cover television, film and music, as well as the celebrity party scene.

event.title: Tanked Magic
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 1
event.description: An escape artist enlists Brett and Wayde to build a tank that can be part of his act.

event.title: Tanked Magic
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 2
event.description: Brett and Wayde meet up with Penn and Teller to create a truly unique tank that proves tricky.

event.title: Tanked: Unfiltered
event.subtitle: Season 6 Episode 9
event.description: The ATM crew builds a massive ship-shaped tank for The Imaginarium Science Center in Fort Myers, Fla.; major setbacks cause major problems; swimming with unfiltered extras.

event.title: VICE News Tonight
event.subtitle: Season 2 Episode 98
event.description: For decades, newscasts -- at both the local and national level -- have had an anchor or anchors sitting behind a desk and reading news stories.The half-hour "VICE News Tonight'' does away with that tried-and-true formula in an attempt to create what it calls "the first modern news show,'' offering a variety of presentation styles and storytelling capabilities intended to resonate with the growing social and mobile audience.

event.title: The Fight Game with Jim Lampley
event.subtitle: Season 6 Episode 3
event.description: Interview with fighter Sergey Kovalev; Bernard Hopkins breaks down the upcoming championship rematch between Andre Ward and Sergey Kovalev; a recap of Terence Crawford's debut in Madison Square Garden.

event.title: Kingdom
event.subtitle: Season 3 Episode 3
event.description: Kingdom is a raw family drama set against the world of Mixed Martial Arts (MMA) in Venice, California. Alvey Kulina owns Navy St. MMA with the help of his girlfriend Lisa Prince. He is willing to go through extraordinary means to make sure his fighters are taken care of, but all of this responsibility comes at a steep price. He has complicated relationships with both of his sons, Jay and Nate, who are both struggling with their own identities and places within Alvey's life and gym.

event.title: MasterChef
event.subtitle: Season 8 Episode 3
event.description: In their first mystery box challenge of the season, the Top 20 will have to take 12 of the most popular ingredients found on any American home cook's shopping list and make the judges a MASTERCHEF-worthy dish. Whoever wins the challenge will have a huge advantage moving forward in the competition.

event.title: The F Word
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 3
event.description: Special celebrity guests Kal Penn (SUPERHUMAN, "Harold & Kumar") and Max Greenfield (NEW GIRL) will join in the fun as families and friends battle it out in a LIVE high-stakes cook-off. During the battle, Ramsay will host special cooking demos and out-of-the-kitchen adventures with Penn, Greenfield, fans and foodies.

event.title: Primetime Justice with Ashleigh Banfield
event.subtitle: Season 2 Episode 79
event.description: Ashleigh Banfield tackles the most pressing legal and social issues, trials and hot topic debates.

event.title: Lucha Underground
event.subtitle: Season 3 Episode 22
event.description: Lucha Underground, El Rey Network's addictive, lucha libre wrestling series from Emmy Award(R)-winning producer Mark Burnett, United Artists Media Group,Robert Rodriguez and FactoryMade Ventures will return for an all-new second season on Wednesday, January 27 at 8 PM ET/PT, it was announced today. The hour-long weekly series currently in production in Boyle Heights, CA, will continue to bring fans ringside for blood-pumping, chant-starting, fierce lucha libre drama and excitement as the masked heroes and villains battle it out for wrestling supremacy. Leading into the new season, El Rey Network offers fans a chance to get reacquainted with the luchadores, who combine ancient tradition with extraordinary athleticism, with five hours of back-to-back episodes from season one on Wednesdays at 8pm ET/PT beginning January 6th, culminating with an epic weekend long, 40-hour marathon of the entire season from Saturday, January 23rd at 10 AM ET, to Sunday, January 24th at 2 AM ET. "Season two of 'Lucha Underground' absolutely stands on the shoulders of last season with even more excitement and high-flying drama than ever before," said El Rey Network Chairman and Founder Robert Rodriguez. "Mark Burnett and his team have delivered a truly compelling series and we are proud to bring the ancient traditions of Luche Libre to life in an unexpected and action packed format that has become a favorite for wrestling fans everywhere."

event.title: Nightcap
event.subtitle: Season 2 Episode 3
event.description: Staci is caught being a horrible person by Juju Chang's hidden camera show; desperate to prove she's a good person, Staci gets herself in too deep when Brooke Shields pressures her and Kelly Rutherford to take part in a dangerous drinking game.

event.title: The Perfect Murder
event.subtitle: Season 4 Episode 1
event.description: The Perfect Murder brings viewers some of the most diabolical, perplexing murder cases to land on detectives' desks – the kind of cases that make or break careers and provide fodder for Hollywood mystery movies. These ingenious killers are every detective's worst nightmare. Whether by planting false evidence, or writing anonymous letters to police, these murderers will stop at nothing to stay one step ahead and get away with the perfect murder. In this program, we focus on the investigation, as detectives slowly put the pieces together to unravel the twisted truth. As detectives uncover new evidence, and turn to new suspects, we flashback through stylized reenactment, to depict each possible theory of what may have happened.

event.title: Hear No Evil
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 5
event.description: Investigators track a counterfeiter to a storage unit where they find audio recordings of him torturing dozens of women; analyzing the tapes, they realize he may be one of the most depraved serial killers in history.

event.title: Reasonable Doubt
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 8
event.description: In Reasonable Doubt, two investigators re-examine controversial murder cases to help the desperate families of those convicted decide if it's time to appeal... or accept the guilty verdict once and for all.

event.title: The Real Housewives of New York City
event.subtitle: Season 9 Episode
event.description: The Real Housewives of New York City will feature an elite and powerful set of New York socialites as they juggle their careers and home lives with busy calendars packed with charity fund-raising galas, the social whirl of the Hamptons, and interviews for elite private schools. These driven and ambitious women show everyone what it takes to make it in the upper echelon of society, where money and status are an essential way of life.

event.title: The Real Housewives of New York City
event.subtitle: Season 9 Episode 11
event.description: Bethenny hosts her annual holiday party but doesn't invite Ramona; Luann and Tom get married; Tinsley learns that Frenchie has moved into Sonja's townhouse; Luann and Tom host a New York reception for the friends not invited to the wedding.

event.title: Andy Cohen's Then & Now
event.subtitle: Season 2 Episode 7
event.description: Pack your bags, because Andy Cohen is ready to take you on a trip down memory lane. The Watch What Happens Live host will helm the three-part limited series, Andy Cohen's Then & Now (Previously known as "Then and Now with Andy Cohen") premiering Sunday, December 13 at 10/9c. The multi-part special will break down key moments of three significant years in history: 1989, 1994, and 2000. In the special, Andy will be joined by newsmakers, writers, and celebrity guests to discuss trends and events that made each of those years unforgettable, including never-before-heard insider stories from those who experienced the moments for themselves. Guests will include Kelly Ripa, Connie Chung, Dr. Drew, Mariel Hemingway, Real Housewives of New York's Bethenny Frankel, and Margaret Cho, as well as former White House Social Secretary Jeremy Bernard.

event.title: Watch What Happens Live
event.subtitle: Season 14 Episode 101
event.description: Tonight's guests are Luann D'Agostino, Jill Zarin.

event.title: Cutthroat Kitchen
event.subtitle: Season 15 Episode
event.description: Special guest judge William Shatner; chefs have to make their bacon dishes while sitting on a couch; two chefs have to get in the wrestling ring to make their burgers and onion rings; one chef has to shoot pool to move around the kitchen.

event.title: Cutthroat Kitchen
event.subtitle: Season 15 Episode 5
event.description: A special cowboy episode judged by Clay Walker; one chef has to use new hash ingredients that are slid down a bar; two chefs have to prep and cook their steak dinners while riding in a wagon; one chef has to prep their cornbread on saloon doors.

event.title: Cooks vs. Cons
event.subtitle: Season 4 Episode 13
event.description: The pros and amateurs must incorporate carrots into their baked clam dishes in the first round; in the second round, the contestants must fuse tea into their dishes for judges Jeff Mauro and Daphne Oz.

event.title: Little Women: LA
event.subtitle: Season 6 Episode
event.description: Counting down the most shocking moments from the series.

event.title: Little Women: LA
event.subtitle: Season 6 Episode
event.description: Jasmine worries about the state of her marriage after the birth of her son; Terra makes a last ditch effort to get Christy and Briana to sign releases before her book launch; the ladies participate in a Warrior Dash; Briana confronts Tonya.

event.title: Little Women: LA
event.subtitle: Season 6 Episode 17
event.description: Terra Jolé, Tonya Banks, Elena Gant, Christy McGinity Gibel, Traci Harrison Tsou and Briana Manson all return for the second season of Little Women: LA, and the stakes are higher than ever. When a shocking baby announcement is made and there's a new little lady in town, the group's friendships are pushed to the limit. In each hour-long episode, viewers get a unique glimpse into the lives of these girlfriends as they wade through the ups and downs of life, supporting one another every step of the way as they prove, once again, that height is just a number.

event.title: Little Women: Atlanta: Monie Gets Married
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 2
event.description: Monie, Morlin and their entire wedding party hit the Vegas strip for a dual bachelor/bachelorette weekend; Juicy plans a night to remember for Monie; Morlin does not come home after his night out with the boys.

event.title: The Putin Interviews
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 3
event.description: Oliver Stone interviews Russian president Vladimir Putin, Part 3 of 4.

event.title: American Pickers
event.subtitle: Season 17 Episode
event.description: This isn't your grandmother's antiquing. Pickers like Mike Wolfe and Frank Fritz are on a mission to recycle America, even if it means diving into countless piles of grimy junk or getting chased off a gun-wielding homeowner's land. Hitting back roads from coast to coast, the two men earn a living by restoring forgotten relics to their former glory, transforming one person's trash into another's treasure. American Pickers follows them as they scour the country for hidden gems in junkyards, basements, garages and barns, meeting quirky characters and hearing their amazing stories. If you think the antique business is all about upscale boutiques and buttoned-up dealers, this show may change your mind–and teach you a thing or two about American history along the way.

event.title: Big Star Little Star
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 3
event.description: Contestants include former professional basketball player Kenny Smith and his son Malloy, actress Nicole Sullivan and her son Beckett and actor Gilles Marini with his daughter Juliana.

event.title: Brother vs. Brother
event.subtitle: Season 5 Episode 3
event.description: The competition continues and Drew sets out to win with an over-the-top master suite. The brothers will have to work extra hard on their bathrooms and bedrooms as Desert Flippers' Eric and Lindsey Bennett are on hand to judge their work. The winner gets to play with penguins at the Moody Gardens Aquarium in Galveston, TX, while the loser has to clean up the mess.

event.title: House Hunters
event.subtitle: Season 127 Episode 29
event.description: Staten Islanders priced out of New York look for their first home in northern New Jersey; she wants a fixer-upper with a grassless concrete backyard, while he has his eye on a move-in-ready home with a finished basement.

event.title: House Hunters International
event.subtitle: Season 106 Episode 9
event.description: After a lifelong obsession with Africa, a woman moves her family to Cape Town, South Africa, and looks for a place that will provide the smoothest transition to a new culture.

event.title: Nashville Flipped
event.subtitle: Season 2 Episode 3
event.description: In Nashville Flipped house flipper, Troy Shafer, renovates homes in historic communities throughout Nashville, Tennessee. Reviving historic homes is as important to Troy as is accomplishing a financially sound flip. As with many of the old homes he acquires there are always unforeseen challenges, because one never really knows what one has until they begin pulling back the years of neglect. Facing all those challenges and more, Troy calls upon designer friend, Alex Cirimelli, to help tackle a 1932 Craftsman style bungalow.

event.title: Nashville Flipped
event.subtitle: Season 2 Episode 4
event.description: In Nashville Flipped house flipper, Troy Shafer, renovates homes in historic communities throughout Nashville, Tennessee. Reviving historic homes is as important to Troy as is accomplishing a financially sound flip. As with many of the old homes he acquires there are always unforeseen challenges, because one never really knows what one has until they begin pulling back the years of neglect. Facing all those challenges and more, Troy calls upon designer friend, Alex Cirimelli, to help tackle a 1932 Craftsman style bungalow.

event.title: Expedition Unknown
event.subtitle: Season 3 Episode 17
event.description: In the hit series Expedition Unknown, Travel Channel's witty explorer Josh Gates seeks answers to some of the world's most captivating unsolved stories and legends. Gates is on a mission to find the truth behind each iconic legend, digging through years of historical evidence, facts and myths. Leaving no stone unturned, his adventures take him around the globe as he immerses himself in the core locales linked to each tale. From excavating ruins in search of the real Robin Hood to sailing the high seas investigating Christopher Columbus and exploring Nepal's "sky caves" for Shangri La, Gates' archaeological background and ubiquitous sense of humor generate a new take on age-old stories.

event.title: Emogenius
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 1
event.description: Friends battle college students using emojis to solve pop culture puzzles.

event.title: Emogenius
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 2
event.description: Sisters battle a dating couple using emojis to solve pop culture puzzles.

event.title: Idiotest
event.subtitle: Season 4 Episode 43
event.description: High school sweethearts face off against a karate black belt and his cousin.

event.title: Idiotest
event.subtitle: Season 4 Episode 44
event.description: An Army and a Navy veteran compete against a musician and her rapper friend.

event.title: Speed is the New Black
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 4
event.description: Speed is the New Black brings viewers inside Noah's shop where cars are tailor made for a client's lifestyle, environment, driving style and driving mission.

event.title: Junkyard Empire
event.subtitle: Season 3 Episode 10
event.description: In Junkyard Empire, the hunt is on for big, washed up metal-cars, motorcycles, boats, homes, campers and heavy equipment-from police impounds, private auctions, dealers, random driveways or old lots. What might look like a rusted out beater to most people is pure gold in the seasoned eyes of Andy and Bobby as they hunt valuable parts, scrap metal or a potential high-end fabrication for their clientele. Once back at the junkyard its pure hustle-and-bustle chaos as cars are lifted, stacked, torched, stripped and scrapped. At the custom car shop the once ruined cars are brought back to life one panel and plug at a time transforming the trash into treasure for high dollar customers.

event.title: Southern Justice
event.subtitle: Season 4 Episode 3
event.description: Follow the Sheriff Deputies of Sullivan County, TN and Ashe County, NC as they work to keep the peace in the Blue Ridge Mountains on "Southern Justice". Get an unprecedented look into crime in Appalachia, where guns, drugs and alcohol challenge lawmen 24/7.

event.title: Year Million
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 5
event.description: Over-consumption could force us to terraform other planets in future.

event.title: The Fairly OddParents
event.subtitle: Season 10 Episode 26
event.description: The Fairly OddParents follows the comedic adventures of Timmy Turner , a 10-year-old boy who overcomes typical kid obstacles with the help of his wand-wielding wish-granting fairy godparents, Cosmo and Wanda. These wishes fix problems that include everything from an aggravating babysitter to difficult homework assignments. With their eagerness to help Timmy, Cosmo and Wanda always succeed in messing things up.

event.title: Storage Wars
event.subtitle: Season 10 Episode 19
event.description: Brandi and Jarrod uncover an Illuminati-ng stash; Dave does what he does best; and Mary finally gets the help she needs.

event.title: Storage Wars
event.subtitle: Season 10 Episode 20
event.description: Mary tries to impress a client; Rene finds protection from predators; Ivy heads to the barbershop.

event.title: Moltissimo
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 4
event.description: SNL comedians Kyle Mooney and Beck Bennett join the MUNCHIES Kitchen where he invents a new dish, Antra in Porchetta.

event.title: Moltissimo
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 5
event.description: Mario Batali hosts chefs Nicholas Morgenstern and Wes Avila in the MUNCHIES Kitchen for a classic Batali family dish.

event.title: Bong Appétit
event.subtitle: Season 2 Episode 9
event.description: Take a cannabis-fueled culinary journey in search of bold flavors, colorful characters, and truly high-end eating as Bong Appetit travels the world seeking out those with a passion for food, weed, and merriment.

event.title: Desus & Mero
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 79
event.description: In October, we'll be bringing you the first late night talk show on Viceland. The show, appropriately titled Desus & Mero, will be hosted by Desus Nice and the Kid Mero, the dynamic duo behind the legendary Bodega Boys podcast. It'll air four nights a week, Monday through Thursday, and will bring you the day's news and culture stories the way only Desus and Mero can.

event.title: Fargo
event.subtitle: Season 3 Episode 9
event.description: Emmit sits down with Gloria, while Nikki negotiates a deal.

event.title: Blood Drive
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 1
event.description: A cop is forced to partner with a homicidal bombshell in a bloodthirsty road race across America.

event.title: Nobodies
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 11
event.description: Larry, Rachel and Hugh's excitement to finally meet the acclaimed comedy film director Paul Skidmore turns into horror when he brings along his muse: Melissa McCarthy.

event.title: Lopez
event.subtitle: Season 2 Episode 11
event.description: At the big table read for Valleys, George and the network don't see eye to eye; Maronzio hits rock bottom and falls in with a new, life-changing crowd.

event.title: True Life
event.subtitle: Season 23 Episode 5
event.description: On this episode of True Life: I'm Breaking Beauty Norms, we meet two people who defy the typical standard of beauty.

event.title: True Life
event.subtitle: Season 23 Episode 6
event.description: On this episode of True Life: I'm Dying for the Applause, we meet two people who are sacrificing themselves on the altar of fame.

event.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee
event.subtitle: Season 2 Episode 11
event.description: One of the most unique and visible comedic voices on television is coming to TBS in Full Frontal with Samantha Bee. Breaking up late-night's all-male sausage fest, this new show from the longtime Daily Show correspondent will feature Samantha's nuanced view of political and cultural issues, her sharp interview skills, her repartee with world leaders and, of course, her 10-pound lady balls.

event.title: Conan
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 73
event.description: Tonight's guests are Judd Apatow, Tom Papa.

event.title: Nightly Business Report
event.subtitle: Season 37 Episode 118
event.description: This long-running business news show, which premiered in 1979, provides In-depth coverage of business and economic news as well as market analysis.

event.title: Talk Show the Game Show
event.subtitle: Season 1 Episode 11
event.description: Comic/actor Aasif Mandvi talks about his vices; actor John Ross Bowie is an open book about Heathers he's dated; comic Phoebe Robinson's boob grazing story; not one, but two special surprise guests.

event.title: The Daily Show with Trevor Noah
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 80
event.description: Tonight's guest is Vince Staples.

event.title: @midnight
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 80
event.description: Tonight's guests are Wayne Brady,Greg Proops, Beth Dover.

event.title: Celebrity Page
event.subtitle: Season 5 Episode 118
event.description: Getting up close to stars through celebrity news, red carpets, and behind-the-scenes access.

event.title: The Wendy Williams Show
event.subtitle: Season 2017 Episode 102
event.description: Today's guest is Ali Wentworth.
